charaepi_ch0285_00_kai/2301_1101_0100_20:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] stopped by a cave
while [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] was out exploring and found Irida
and Glaceon.
charaepi_ch0285_00_kai/2301_1201_0200_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! Did you come here to
beat the heat too?
charaepi_ch0285_00_kai/2301_1201_0300_10:
It’s nice and cool inside this cave. It’s much more
comfortable than outside, isn’t it?
charaepi_ch0285_00_kai/2301_1201_0400_10:
Well, it’s cool compared to the temperature out
there, anyway. It’s still pretty hot in here.
charaepi_ch0285_00_kai/2301_0402_0800_10: The sun’s up high and the air’s humid.
charaepi_ch0285_00_kai/2301_1201_0900_10:
I don’t do so well in hot weather... Sometimes I
come here to cool off.
charaepi_ch0285_00_kai/2301_1101_1000_20:
After Glaceon let out a cry, a cool breeze came
flowing in.
charaepi_ch0285_00_kai/2301_1201_1100_10: That’s my Glaceon! You really know me well!
charaepi_ch0285_00_kai/2301_0401_1300_10:
Yep! I grew up in a very cold place, and Glaceon
is like family to me!
charaepi_ch0285_00_kai/2301_0402_1500_10:
Yep! Glaceon is like family to me, so we
understand each other’s thoughts perfectly.
charaepi_ch0285_00_kai/2301_1201_1600_10:
That’s why I was a little uncomfortable putting
my Glaceon inside a Poké Ball.
charaepi_ch0285_00_kai/2301_1201_1700_10:
It felt like we wouldn’t be equals anymore—like it
would make me her “master.”
charaepi_ch0285_00_kai/2301_1201_1800_10: But I made up my mind soon after that.
charaepi_ch0285_00_kai/2301_1201_1900_10:
Poké Balls aren’t for restraining Pokémon. They
create bonds of trust.
charaepi_ch0285_00_kai/2301_1201_2000_10:
There was someone who taught me that. Someone
who overcame numerous obstacles together with
Pokémon in the land of Hisui.
charaepi_ch0285_00_kai/2301_1201_2100_10:
It’s the same for all the Pokém—no, all of you
sync pairs—on Pasio.
charaepi_ch0285_00_kai/2301_1201_2200_10:
They all look so happy together, with strong
bonds and trust in one another.
charaepi_ch0285_00_kai/2301_1201_2300_10:
So the relationship that people and Pokémon have
in this space isn’t so different, right?
charaepi_ch0285_00_kai/2301_0401_2500_10:
Yeah! They’re friends—and also family! We’ll live
together with them forever and ever!
charaepi_ch0285_00_kai/2301_0302_2600_10:
We’re partners that walk side
by side!
charaepi_ch0285_00_kai/2301_0402_2700_10:
Yeah! Every step we take, we do it together with
our Pokémon!
charaepi_ch0285_00_kai/2301_1201_2800_10:
I want Glaceon and I to really understand each
other—just as much as any other sync pair
on Pasio!
charaepi_ch0285_00_kai/2301_1201_2900_10:
The world really is a vast place... There are so
many things to see that I never knew about.
charaepi_ch0285_00_kai/2301_1201_3000_10:
I want to tell everyone in Hisui that using Poké
Balls to coexist with Pokémon isn’t a mistake!
charaepi_ch0285_00_kai/2301_1201_3100_10:
So with that in mind, Glaceon and I have to be
Poké Ball pioneers...
charaepi_ch0285_00_kai/2301_1201_3200_10: as the Pearl Clan’s first sync pair!
charaepi_ch0285_00_kai/2301_1201_3400_10:
Pasio’s so hot that if I don’t have Glaceon out, I’ll
melt from the heat!
charaepi_ch0285_00_kai/2301_1201_3500_10:
I guess Glaceon won’t be spending too much time
in her Poké Ball after all...
